last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Not for the first time, Kate is being sued, but this time by Councillor Bone. Koji discovers he is under investigation for working illegally.

name: Kate & Koji
overview: Kate runs an old-fashioned caf√© in a seaside town, and develops a strong, if sometimes volatile, friendship with asylum-seeking African doctor Koji. Although from different worlds, Kate and Koji are similar in ways they do not see for themselves.
